name: X3/ExMo3 Mario
author: Llennpie | OG: Enkal
description:
X3 (also known as ExMo3) is a highly customizable Mario model relying solely on textures and expressions.

- Textures can be modified in /mario/. Delete mario_geo.bin after each texture edit
- The hammer can equipped by setting Mario's hand switch to "Right Open"

To avoid including copyrighted textures, X3 Mario's default textures have been swapped with hand-drawn, royalty-free replacements.
